email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 200,000 and LOA of 300m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. We are looking to secure a long-term agreement and can commit to multiple shipments over the next year.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our volume commitment? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
John Doe
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of USD 23 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of USD 23 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
John Doe
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-15 and end on 2023-10-20. We can offer a laytime of 5 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
John Doe
Charterer Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarão to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
